abstract: The companies introduced dozens of new products, and sales in countries like China have increased as consumers’ incomes expand.
snippet: The companies introduced dozens of new products, and sales in countries like China have increased as consumers’ incomes expand.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble and Colgate-Palmolive reported profits yesterday that exceeded analysts’ estimates on consumer demand for new razors and soap and increased sales to emerging markets.

headline.main: New Products and Demand in Emerging Markets Fatten Profits at P.& G. and Colgate
headline.print_headline: New Products and Demand in Emerging Markets Fatten Profits at P.& G. and Colgate
